name: UE4 Gravity Swapping and Jump Pad
name_original: UE4 Gravity Swapping and Jump Pad
description:
Just a super small demo from my first time using UE4. Implements gravity swapping and jump pads in a pretty hacky way, but shows that it's at least somewhat possible to do without modifying the engine.

Note: this is a bad way of doing this, it's sustainable for a minor project prototype, but I'd recommend editing the engine source or creating your own gravity system.
